link.script:

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc
hJDwNd-AhqUyc-II5mzb pSzOP-AhqUyc-II5mzb jXK9ad D2fZ2 wHaque GNzUNc

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;
margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: A message from Superintendent Brad Romano:

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: This message is specifically for the class of 2020 and their families. Due to the extension of our school closure through May 1, 2020, the decision has been made to postpone our Senior Scholarship and Awards Night originally scheduled for May 20th. Additionally, scholarship applications that were originally due on Monday April 6th will now be due on Wednesday April 15. All scholarship applications are available on our district website. Submission of scholarship applications must be

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: by the 15th. Please do not submit any paper copies to us this time. Additional information regarding our postponed scholarship night will be made available once there is more clarity to our return to the building. As always, stay safe Wildcats!
